sample_ani4.prompt: A vibrant 3D anime style avatar of a young blonde woman with high pigtails, wearing a black Gothic Lolita dress with an off-shoulder neckline, lace choker, and gloves, speaking playfully to the camera with expressive, exaggerated hand gestures and a slight smirk. The camera is steady, and the background is a dark, simple studio.

sample_ani2.prompt: A highly detailed 3D anime avatar of a blonde woman with large twin pigtails, wearing a black Gothic Lolita dress with an off-shoulder neckline, lace choker, and a belted corset. She is speaking directly to the camera with lively facial expressions and subtle hand movements, set against a dark, minimalist background.

sample_ani3.prompt: A sleek 3D anime style avatar of a blonde woman with an updo, wearing a long, high-slit black halter gown and gold jewelry. She is speaking directly to the viewer with confident, graceful hand gestures. The background is a vibrant, modern stage set with a neon pink geometric pattern and dark lighting.

sample_whisper.prompt: A high-quality 3D anime style avatar of a young woman with bright blonde pigtails and a Gothic Lolita black dress with an off-shoulder lace neckline and corset belt. She is speaking directly to the camera, using expressive facial movements and a flirty, confident pose. The background is a simple, dark, and moody color.
